apiwrushana kiyanne eka eka wrushanayaka eewa matha pihitala thiyena punchi panuwek wage wyuhayak.meyath nala paddhathiyakma thamayi.eeth meya wrushanayen pita wena nala tika ekata ekathu karala thani batayak bawata (shukra nalaya bawata ) path karanda dayaka wenawa.ee wagema wrushanayen pita wena shukranu parinatha wenneth apiwrushanayedi thamayi.

mage dewana lipiya pala karamin dakwu suhadathawayata sudika sahodarayata sthuthi wantha wemi.ee wagema me lipiya kiyawa apata watina widiyo klipayak laba dima gana gayijin sahodarayatath thuthi pudami.emenma ma dirimath wana lesa wachana kotamin saha aadaraniya ek marana tharjanayak :) karamin mage sahodara kala samaga me blog awakashaye mage minibiriya ekathu kala wachana mata ithamath watinawa.ma wenuwen wachanayak liwimata kalaya waya kirima gana oba samata mage pranamaya puda karami.!blogayak aarambha kirima gana kiyanna thiyenne tikak parakku weyi kiyala.oba siyalu denata penawa athi mama komant karaddiyi,lipiyeyi thiyena wenasa.ema wenasa mathalanta therum gihilla kelinma kiyala thibuna.ee gana sthuthiyi mathalan.mama kohomath digatama oba sama samagin innawa.obalagen igena 2015 withara weddi balamu mage ekak patan ganna.ada patan aran heta welenna denna bahane.oba samata dirghayusha pathami.!

pansilu wikramarathna, pankaja wikramarathna, jaksan anthani, kaushalya pranandu, hemasiri liyanage, priyantha sirikumara, thilakshani rathnayaka aadi rangana shilpa shilpiniyange ranganayenda, palitha pererage kamarakaranayen da hadawena "wishama bhaga" sinamapataya, shraddha madhya jalaya wenuwen aludeniye subodhi swaminwahansege nishpadanayaki.
wishala wadagathkamakin yuktha wiya hakiwa thibina yi sithiya haki awastha, eka wakyayakin ho dekakin awasan kirimata kathuwaraya pelambai athi aakarayak witeka penenta thibe.
danna kenek innawa nam kiyanna.
mama, samurayi, sara, shiro kiyana api hathara dena gange wathurayi, ithuruwela thibba chokalat tikakuyi ekka ee sadkaryaya patan gaththa.
